mapper.select: /* UsmMapper.selectUserListCnt */ SELECT '가' AS COL_01, 1 AS COL_02, 'a' AS COL_03, 'A' AS COL_04 UNION ALL SELECT '나' AS COL_01, 2 AS COL_02, 'b' AS COL_03, 'B' AS COL_04 UNION ALL SELECT '다' AS COL_01, 3 AS COL_02, 'c' AS COL_03, 'C' AS COL_04 UNION ALL SELECT '라' AS COL_01, 4 AS COL_02, 'd' AS COL_03, 'D' AS COL_04
